# ARPlaneAnchor.Classification.Status

**Enumeration**

Reasons ARKit is unable to classify a plane.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Status
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneAnchor/Classification-swift.enum/Status] tells you why a plane anchor’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneAnchor/classification-2r4x8] is [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneAnchor/Classification-swift.enum/none(_:)].

## Classification Status

- **ARPlaneAnchor.Classification.Status.notAvailable**: ARKit cannot currently provide plane classification information.
- **ARPlaneAnchor.Classification.Status.undetermined**: ARKit has not yet produced a classification for the plane anchor.
- **ARPlaneAnchor.Classification.Status.unknown**: ARKit has completed its classification process for the plane anchor, but the result is inconclusive.

## Missing Classification Status

- **ARPlaneAnchor.Classification.none(_:)**: No classification is available for the plane anchor.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
